data.title: Ukraine has removed all 1,320 statues of Lenin
US destroyer collides with merchant ship near Singapore
Breitbart mistakes German footballer Lukas Podolski for human trafficker

The world's largest floating solar farm has begun producing energy atop a former coal mine — The 40-megawatt power plant consists of 120,000 solar panels covering an area of more than 160 American football fields. The $45-million investment could help power 15,000 homes.
Lebanon has foiled an ISIS plot to blow up a plane with a bomb hidden in a Barbie Doll on a flight From Australia to Abu Dhabi
Sons confirm death of US soldier James Dresnok, who defected to North Korea
Big Ben bongs to sound at noon for final time for four years
Grace Mugabe escapes assault charges using diplomatic immunity after beating a South African model with an electrical extension cord

German Chancellor Angela Merkel criticized Turkey's use of an Interpol arrest warrant to detain a German writer in Spain, telling an election town hall event on Sunday that this amounted to abuse of the international police agency.
Toronto man who disappeared 3 years ago surfaces on Interpol list of feared ISIS suicide bombers
Peter Madsen says journalist Kim Wall died in accident on submarine, buried at sea
Mosques speak out in Indian city to stop sale of brides to Arab men
Evidence for long distance Neolithic trading network in Vietnam uncovered - “This isn’t a case of people producing a couple of extra items on top of what they need. It’s a major operation.”
Israeli teens attack IDF soldiers for looking Arab, one arrested
